name: overstretched
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having enough money, people, equipment, etc.: Hospitals are overstretched, and patients are not getting the treatment they need.

Add to word list
Add to word list
having more work or other activities than you can manage: Our staff work hard but the reality is they are overstretched. This is a crowded and chronically overstretched rail system.
FINANCE having borrowed or spent more money than you can pay: Rising interest rates will impact seriously on overstretched consumers. See also
overextended
